original_text:
thorns and thistles it shall bring forth for you;
    and you shall eat the plants of the field.
korean_text: 땅이 네게 가시덤불과 엉겅퀴를 낼 것이라 네가 먹을 것은 밭의 채소인즉

sentences.original_text: thorns and thistles it shall bring forth for you
sentences.korean_translation: 가시와 엉겅퀴를 너를 위해 낼 것이요

sentences.original_text: and you shall eat the plants of the field.
